vulnerabilities: Information Exposure Through an Error Message
description: The function is vulnerable to several types of attacks. CWE-22: Path Traversal is possible due to the use of user-supplied input in file paths without proper validation or sanitization. CWE-78: Command Injection is possible due to the use of user-supplied input in command line arguments. CWE-94: Code Injection is possible due to the use of user-supplied input in code without proper validation or sanitization. CWE-209: Information Exposure Through an Error Message is possible due to the use of detailed error messages that could reveal sensitive information about the system or application.
